item.title: Implement MFA using swiyu, the Swiss E-ID with Duende IdentityServer, ASP.NET Core Identity and .NET Aspire
item.description: The post shows how to use the Swiss Digital identity and trust infrastructure, (swiyu) as an MFA method in an ASP.NET Core web application using ASP.NET Core Identity and Duende IdentityServer. The generic containers from swiyu are used to integrate the Swiss E-ID and the OpenID for Verifiable Presentations standards. item.title: Implement a secure MCP server using OAuth DPoP and Duende identity provider
item.description: This post demonstrates how an ASP.NET Core application can connect to a secure MCP server using OpenID Connect and OAuth. Both applications use Duende IdentityServer as the identity provider. The MCP server requires delegated DPoP access tokens.
